name: Cosmic Conflict (PlatonRaz)
description:
In Cosmic Conflict, you earn score by destroying as many aliens as possible, there are multiple stages to this game,  with a few bosses. Use score to earn extra ships with unique abilities. This is my first proper project using Python and Pygame together, taking me around 2 months to reach this stage. As simple as it is, I am quite proud of it, enjoy.

Instagram - @platon_raz
